Transform geometry to spatial object

Source: R/geom_tools.r
gToSp.Rd

An object of class Spatial* is the sp-package representation of a geom.

gToSp(geom, crs = NULL)

Arguments

geom

[geom]
Object of class geom.
crs

[proj4string(1)]
corrdinate reference system of the object.

Value

Depending on the provided geometry either a SpatialPointsDataFrame, SpatialLinesDataFrame or SpatialPolygonsDataFrame object.

Examples

require(magrittr)
#> Loading required package: magrittr
somePoints <- data.frame(X = c(5027609, 5190599, 5326537, 5222810,
                         5234735, 5281527, 5189955, 5041066),
                         Y = c(3977612, 3971119, 4028167, 3997230,
                         4060164, 4117856, 4118207, 4062838),
                         id = c(1:8))

pointsGeom <- geomPoint(anchor = somePoints)
polyGeom <- gGroup(geom = pointsGeom, index = c(rep(1, 8))) %>%
  geomPolygon()

(spPoints <- gToSp(geom = pointsGeom, crs = projs$laea))
#> class       : SpatialPointsDataFrame 
#> features    : 8 
#> extent      : 5027609, 5326537, 3971119, 4118207  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)
#> coord. ref. : +proj=laea +lat_0=52 +lon_0=10 +x_0=4321000 +y_0=3210000 +ellps=GRS80 +units=m +no_defs 
#> variables   : 1
#> names       : id 
#> min values  :  1 
#> max values  :  8 
(spPolygon <- gToSp(geom = polyGeom, crs = projs$laea))
#> class       : SpatialPolygonsDataFrame 
#> features    : 1 
#> extent      : 5027609, 5326537, 3971119, 4118207  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)
#> coord. ref. : +proj=laea +lat_0=52 +lon_0=10 +x_0=4321000 +y_0=3210000 +ellps=GRS80 +units=m +no_defs 
#> variables   : 1
#> names       : id 
#> value       :  1
